metadata.name: Potential AMSI Bypass Via .NET Reflection
metadata.comment: Detects Request to "amsiInitFailed" that can be used to disable AMSI Scanning

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('system.management.automation.amsiutils')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('amsiinitfailed')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('[ref].assembly.gettype')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('setvalue($null,$true)')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('nonpublic,static')))

output.summary: Detects Request to "amsiInitFailed" that can be used to disable AMSI Scanning
